parameters.query:
SELECT 
  u.user_id,
  u.name,
  u.role,
  d.device_id,
  d.device_name,
  d.is_active,
  d.last_seen,
  l.latitude,
  l.longitude,
  l.accuracy,
  l.timestamp as location_timestamp,
  CASE 
    WHEN d.last_seen > NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' THEN true 
    ELSE false 
  END as is_online
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN devices d ON d.user_id = u.user_id AND d.is_active = true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT latitude, longitude, accuracy, timestamp
  FROM locations
  WHERE device_id = d.device_id
  ORDER BY received_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
) l ON true
ORDER BY u.user_id;
SELECT zone_id, name, center_lat, center_lng, radius_meters FROM safe_zones WHERE is_active = true ORDER BY zone_id;
